Implementation of north-south joint declaration called for 
    Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Chae Jong Man, chairman of the central association of Korean nationals in Russia, on Feb. 12 released a statement in support of an appeal to the 70 million Koreans adopted at the 2001 meeting for the independent reunification of the Korean nation.
 Saying that national reunification would come when all the Koreans achieve harmony and unity, he stressed that all the fellow countrymen in the north, south and abroad should accomplish the cause of national reunification at an early date irrespective of ideology, system, political view and religion.    
 Noting that the master key to achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country is to thoroughly implement the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, he called on all the compatriots at home and abroad to dynamically turn out in the patriotic work to implement the historic declaration by their concerted efforts.
